answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
You may want to look into the Great Cities Institute at the University of Illinois at Chicago which engages research and partnerships to address key urban issues in Chicago. The following is the institute's website: http://www.uic.edu/cuppa/gci/index.shtml
And attached is a document about Chicago's response to building university and community collaborations through the institute. Beginning on page 10 highlights more of how the city and the institute came to be. Hope this helps.

author: Sylvia Carrillo
text:
The City of Corpus Christi is looking to partner with our local university to create a "think tank" of sorts to address critical issues specific to our area and region. We would like to create a non-profit and make entrance into the program very competitive.
Does anyone have anything similar they may have done or are doing in their area?
Any info would be appreciated!
Thanks,
Sylvia
title: Think Tank
